I hope you are doing well,

this is to inform you that we had one walk-in Customer in the shop and while he was walking in middle of Store, he accidently hit one of the LLADRO item and damaged his hand.


Therefore, we kindly seek your support to claim with Insurance.

 

 

Warm regards,
Shihab
